titleStmt.title: The counsels of wisdom or, a collection of the maxims of Solomon. Most necessary for a man wisely to behave himself. With reflections on those maxims. Rendred into English by T.D.
Conseils de la sagesse. English.
titleStmt.author: Boutauld, Michel, 1604-1689.
T. D.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Sam. Smith, bookseller at the Princes Arms in St. Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: In fact a translation of Michel Boutauld's compilation: 'Conseils de la sagesse'.
With a divisional title page for the second part.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Princes Arms in St. Pauls Churchyard
